description: Rod Daily has invited a few friends over to get ready for a night of partying but when there's 4 horny guys in a bathroom together, talking about all the chicks they're going to fuck when they go out to the club your going to get a lot of pent up sexual energy. Now we all know you don't want to be a two pump chump when you're getting your fuck on, so these guys, Rod, Marcus, Zack & Tyler decided to release some steam before they hit the town. By that we mean these 4 suck, fuck and unload all over each other. The hot shower isn't the only thing steaming up the bathroom mirror.Enjoy!
title: Clubbing Or Fucking
